â€¢ ~24 capsules across 3 sections (Front, Middle, Back)
â€¢ Each capsule: personal light, USB port, power outlet, privacy curtain
â€¢ Shared kitchen with fridge & microwave

â€¢ Living room area
â€¢ Free WiFi

response.en:
ğŸ“‹ *House Rules*

1. No smoking indoors
2. Quiet hours: 11 PM â€“ 7 AM
3. No outside guests in sleeping area
4. Keep common areas clean
5. No illegal substances
6. Check-out by 12:00 PM
7. Report any damage immediately

_Adults only hostel_
response.ms:
ğŸ“‹ *Peraturan Rumah*

1. Dilarang merokok di dalam
2. Waktu senyap: 11 PM â€“ 7 AM
3. Tiada tetamu luar di kawasan tidur
4. Jaga kebersihan kawasan berkongsi
5. Tiada bahan terlarang
6. Daftar keluar sebelum 12:00 PM
7. Laporkan kerosakan segera

_Hostel untuk dewasa sahaja_
